The doctrines triall shewing both the necessity and the way of trying what is taught, in a sermon vpon 1 Thess.5.21. By Sam. Hieron. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[8], 98 p.
Printed by Humfrey Lownes, for William Butler [jun.]; and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreet, At London : 1616.
Qualification of printer's name from STC. Some print faded and show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
